entry.title: LBLA Break Up with Your Makeup - Makeup Remover Mitts
entry.summary:
Vendor: LASHBOXLA
Type: Aftercare
Price: 12.00

REMOVES MAKEUP FAST: Package of 2 reusable makeup removing cloth finger mitts that wipe away makeup, dirt and oil in just seconds.

REUSABLE & MACHINE WASHABLE: These cloth mitts fit over your fingers to clean smaller, precision areas like the lash line and lips and are machine washable - throw in the wash to use again and again.

FREE OF CHEMICALS: Using only warm water or with Lashbox LA Bubble Wash. These ultra-soft, woven polyester-blend cloths get rid of tough makeup without leaving behind residue - just fresh, healthy soft, skin.

FOR BEST RESULTS: Completely soak cloth in water or Lashbox LA Bubble Wash and use circular motions on your face, being gentle around the eye area. Rinse and lay flat to dry.

entry.title: Pure Pink Gel Remover
entry.summary:
Vendor: EYELASH MAKER
Type: Liquids
Price: 25.00

Pure Pink Gel Remover/Grapefruit scent 25ml


The gentle special formula effectively and comfortably removes extended eyelashes,
conditioning natural lashes and spreading fresh aroma of grapefruit.

How to use

- Apply the Gel Remover to the lashes carefully using the micro brushes.

- Wait 2-3 min, place the lash between the brush tips.

- Slowly and carefully brush upwards to dissolve the adhesive and remove the lash.

Ingredients

Gamma Butyrolactone, Glycerin, Hydroxypropylcellulose, Aqua, Perfume, Cl 45410

¬†

entry.title: Protein Cleansing Remover Spray
entry.summary:
Vendor: MAX2LASH
Type: Liquids
Price: 25.00

Product Highlights:

¬†

The¬†protein remover¬†is used to prep and disinfect the lashes.

Designed to remove residual cosmetics and natural oils, our Primer will cleanse and prepare the lashes for maximum bonding of the adhesive.

As the adhesive will bond faster, overall application time will be reduced.

Primer can be used on natural or extended lashes making it ideal for both initial application and touch-ups.

Our Primer will not affect any existing eyelashes extensions bonds.

How to use:¬†

Client‚Äôs eyes should be closed when applying primer, do not apply directly on the eyes.

Hold flat cotton pad under lashes to catch excess primer.

Squeeze a few drops or one spray of primer on a small to medium makeup brush.

Brush primer on lashes, drying time is approximately 2 seconds.

Dry lashes thoroughly with an air-blower or fan before applying eyelash extensions as usual

Disclaimer:¬†

  • We recommend that you keep the primer in refrigerator or somewhere cooler than room temperature for a longer storage life.
  • If the primer is kept in a refrigerator, it is required to be left out for about 1 to 2 hours before use.
  • For advanced technicians only. Do not use on yourself.
  • We are not responsible for the misuse of the primer.
  • You are solely responsible for the product once you purchase it from us. Performance and results of the primer vary from person to person.

entry.title: Max2Originale - Protein Remover Pads
entry.summary:
Vendor: MAX2LASH
Type: Application
Price: 20.00

PROTEIN REMOVER CLEANSING PADS

SPECIALLY MADE FOR EYELASH EXTENSION

„ÜçAs gently moisturizing the skin, cotton pads remove eye make-up and facial oil.
„ÜçPhytoncide and vitamin E protect the delicated skin area.
„Üç75 Pads

How To Use :

  • When removing makeup: Take off one pad, putting it and pushing it softly while close your eyes. After a few seconds later, take off the pad and then you can see the makeup, mascara, and wasted protein is clearly removed. Softly wipe remaining mascara on your eyes.
  • When eyelash extension: Before operation, take off one pad, putting it on the eyes and pushing it softly and wipe eyelashes and skin oil softly. You can see the makeup, mascara, and wasted protein is clearly removed. When skin oil is certainly removed, duration period will be almost doubled.
